alert.note: Alert for Santa Lucia Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 26 at 9:54PM PDT until September 27 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Lucia Mountains. * WHEN...Until noon PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These strong winds will combine with a dry air mass to create elevated to potentially critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
